# Contributing to HydroNet

## Development Setup
1. Fork the repository
2. Clone your fork: `git clone https://github.com/YOUR_USERNAME/HydroNet.git`
3. Install dependencies: `pip install -e ".[dev]"`
4. Create a feature branch: `git checkout -b feature/your-feature`

## Code Style
- Follow PEP 8 for Python code
- Use type hints for function signatures
- Document all public functions and classes
- Write tests for new functionality

## Pull Request Process
1. Update documentation if needed
2. Add or update tests
3. Ensure all tests pass: `pytest`
4. Update CHANGELOG.md
5. Submit PR with detailed description

## Research Contributions
- Follow academic citation standards
- Provide reproducible analysis notebooks
- Include data sources and preprocessing steps
